Using a pipeline without specifying a model name and revision in production is not recommended.

RuntimeError: At least one of TensorFlow 2.0 or PyTorch should be installed. To install TensorFlow 2.0, read the instructions at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/ To install PyTorch, read the instructions at https://pytorch.org/.
ChatGPT said:
Thanks ‚Äî your environment is very close to working. The issue is this:

‚ùå HuggingFace transformers is installed, but PyTorch is not properly detected.

üß† Diagnosis
You mentioned torch is visible here:

torch
torch-2.1.2+cpu.dist-info
But your Python environment isn't detecting it, which means either:

It's not installed in the same virtual environment you're using (review_assistant_env)

Or it‚Äôs a broken install, e.g., wrong CPU wheel or file path mismatch

‚úÖ Fix: Reinstall PyTorch (CPU version)
Inside your active venv, reinstall it cleanly:

pip uninstall torch -y
pip install torch==2.1.2+cpu -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/torch_stable.html
If you're offline, let me know ‚Äî I‚Äôll help you install from a wheel instead.

üîç Verify after reinstalling
Then run:

python
